article_title: The Holiday Ads Making Waves Online
article_text:
The holidays are a critical time for brands and retailers to reach consumers. They often turn to creative marketing schemes to grab shoppers’ attention.

Here’s a look at the brands whose holiday ads have gotten consumers buzzing – and not always in a positive way – based on data from digital marketing technology company Amobee Brand Intelligence. Amobee’s digital content engagement metric measures the content users are interacting with across more than 600,000 sites on mobile, video, web and social platforms. For this...

twitter.description: Bloomingdale’s Edeka and John Lewis are among the brands whose ads have gotten consumers buzzing – and not always in a positive way – based on data from digital marketing technology company Amobee Brand Intelligence.
